WFAPI::OverlayItemVisualSpec::TextAlignment

Detailed Description

Struct that holds a horizontal and a vertical alignment for texts. See TextHorizontalAlignment and TextVerticalAlignment for the different values.

Parameters:
horizAlign The horizontal alignment, see TextHorizontalAlignment
vertAlign The vertical alignment, see TextVerticalAlignment.
